taskDescription: I can do all kinds of tasks thanks to the latest breakthroughs in agentic coding capabilities and access to tools that let me create & edit files, explore complex projects, use the browser, and execute terminal commands (with your permission, of course). I can even use MCP to create new tools and extend my own capabilities.
apiProviderNeeded: To get started, this extension needs an API provider.
update: Our biggest update yet is here - we're officially changing our name from Roo Cline to Roo Code! After growing beyond 50,000 installations, we're ready to chart our own course. Our heartfelt thanks to everyone in the Cline community who helped us reach this milestone.
customModesTitle: Custom Modes: Celebrating Our New Identity
customModesIntro:
To mark this new chapter, we're introducing the power to shape Roo Code into any role you need! Create specialized personas and create an entire team of agents with deeply customized prompts:
  • QA Engineers who write thorough test cases and catch edge cases
  • Product Managers who excel at user stories and feature prioritization
  • UI/UX Designers who craft beautiful, accessible interfaces
  • Code Reviewers who ensure quality and maintainability
Just click the icon to get started with Custom Modes!
nextChapterInvitation: Join Us for the Next Chapter
shareCustomModes: We can't wait to see how you'll push Roo Code's potential even further! Share your custom modes and join the discussion at <RedditLink>reddit.com/r/RooCode</RedditLink>.
feedbackMessage: If you have any questions or feedback, feel free to open an issue at <GitHubLink>github.com/RooVetGit/Roo-Code</GitHubLink> or join <RedditLink>reddit.com/r/RooCode</RedditLink>.
mcpDescription: The <MCPLink>Model Context Protocol</MCPLink> enables communication with locally running MCP servers that provide additional tools and resources to extend Roo's capabilities. You can use <CommunityServersLink>community-made servers</CommunityServersLink> or ask Roo to create new tools specific to your workflow (e.g., "add a tool that gets the latest npm docs").

intro.title: What can Roo do for you?
intro.description: Thanks to the latest breakthroughs in agentic coding capabilities, I can handle complex software development tasks step-by-step. With tools that let me create & edit files, explore complex projects, use the browser, and execute terminal commands (after you grant permission), I can assist you in ways that go beyond code completion or tech support. I can even use MCP to create new tools and extend my own capabilities.

input.context: @ to add context, / to switch modes
input.images: , hold shift to drag in images

settings.title: Settings
settings.deleteApiConfiguration: Are you sure you want to delete this configuration profile?
settings.deleteCustomMode: Are you sure you want to delete this custom mode?
settings.resetState: Are you sure you want to reset all state and secret storage in the extension? This cannot be undone.

language.title: Language Settings
language.description: Select your preferred display language. Changes will take effect immediately.

apiConfigManager.title: Configuration Profile
apiConfigManager.description: Save different API configurations to quickly switch between providers and settings

errors.nameExists: A profile with this name already exists

autoApprove.title: Auto-Approve Settings
autoApprove.description: The following settings allow Roo to automatically perform operations without requiring approval. Enable these settings only if you fully trust the AI and understand the associated security risks.

readOnly.title: Always approve read-only operations
readOnly.description: When enabled, Roo will automatically view directory contents and read files without requiring you to click the Approve button.

write.title: Always approve write operations
write.description: Automatically create and edit files without requiring approval
write.delay: Delay after writes to allow diagnostics to detect potential problems

browser.title: Always approve browser actions
browser.description:
Automatically perform browser actions without requiring approval
Note: Only applies when the model supports computer use

mcp.title: Always approve MCP tools
mcp.description: Enable auto-approval of individual MCP tools in the MCP Servers view (requires both this setting and the tool's individual "Always allow" checkbox)

modeSwitch.title: Always approve mode switching & task creation
modeSwitch.description: Automatically switch between different AI modes and create new tasks without requiring approval

execute.title: Always approve allowed execute operations
execute.description: Automatically execute allowed terminal commands without requiring approval

retry.title: Always retry failed API requests
retry.description: Automatically retry failed API requests when server returns an error response

viewport.title: Viewport size
viewport.description: Select the viewport size for browser interactions. This affects how websites are displayed and interacted with.

screenshot.title: Screenshot quality
screenshot.description: Adjust the WebP quality of browser screenshots. Higher values provide clearer screenshots but increase token usage.

sound.title: Enable sound effects
sound.description: When enabled, Roo will play sound effects for notifications and events.

terminalOutput.title: Terminal output limit
terminalOutput.description: Maximum number of lines to include in terminal output when executing commands. When exceeded lines will be removed from the middle, saving tokens.

diff.title: Enable editing through diffs
diff.description: When enabled, Roo will be able to edit files more quickly and will automatically reject truncated full-file writes. Works best with the latest Claude 3.5 Sonnet model.

matchPrecision.title: Match precision
matchPrecision.description: This slider controls how precisely code sections must match when applying diffs. Lower values allow more flexible matching but increase the risk of incorrect replacements. Use values below 100% with extreme caution.

unifiedStrategy.title: Use experimental unified diff strategy
unifiedStrategy.description: Enable the experimental unified diff strategy. This strategy might reduce the number of retries caused by model errors but may cause unexpected behavior or incorrect edits. Only enable if you understand the risks and are willing to carefully review all changes.
unifiedStrategy.warning: Warning: This is an experimental feature and may cause unexpected behavior.

searchReplace.title: Use experimental search and replace tool
searchReplace.description: Enable the experimental search and replace tool, allowing Roo to replace multiple instances of a search term in one request.
searchReplace.warning: Warning: This is an experimental feature and may cause unexpected behavior.

insertBlock.title: Use experimental insert content tool
insertBlock.description: Enable the experimental insert content tool, allowing Roo to insert content at specific line numbers without needing to create a diff.

checkpoints.title: Enable experimental checkpoints
checkpoints.description:
When enabled, Roo will save a checkpoint whenever a file in the workspace is modified,
								added or deleted, letting you easily revert to a previous state.

reset.title: Reset State
reset.description: This will reset all global state and local storage in the extension.

autoApprove.title: Auto-approve:
autoApprove.description: Auto-approve allows Roo Code to perform actions without asking for permission. Only enable for actions you fully trust.

readFiles.label: Read files and directories
readFiles.description: Allows access to read any file on your computer.

editFiles.label: Edit files
editFiles.description: Allows modification of any files on your computer.

executeCommands.label: Execute approved commands
executeCommands.description: Allows execution of approved terminal commands. You can configure this in the settings panel.

useBrowser.label: Use the browser
useBrowser.description: Allows ability to launch and interact with any website in a headless browser.

useMcp.label: Use MCP servers
useMcp.description: Allows automatic switching between different AI modes and creating new tasks without requiring approval.

switchModes.label: Switch modes & create tasks
switchModes.description: Allows automatic switching between different AI modes and creating new tasks without requiring approval.

retryRequests.label: Retry failed requests
retryRequests.description: Automatically retry failed API requests when the provider returns an error response.

instructionsText: Instructions can also be loaded from <link /> in your workspace.

promptsView.promptCustomInstructions: Custom instructions specific to {{modeName}} mode can also be loaded from {{fileName}} in your workspace.
promptsView.createModeDescription: Hit the + to create a new custom mode, or just ask Roo in chat to create one for you!
promptsView.roleDefinitionDescription: Define Roo's expertise and personality for this mode. This description shapes how Roo presents itself and approaches tasks.
promptsView.preferredLanguageDescription: Select the language that Cline should use for communication.
promptsView.customInstructionsDescription: These instructions apply to all modes. They provide a base set of behaviors that can be enhanced by mode-specific instructions below.
promptsView.apiConfigurationDescription: Select which API configuration to use for this mode
promptsView.toolsDescription: Tools for built-in modes cannot be modified
promptsView.enhancementApiConfigDescription:
You can select an API configuration to always use for enhancing prompts,
or just use whatever is currently selected
promptsView.testEnhancementPrompt: Enter a prompt to test the enhancement
promptsView.name: Name
promptsView.addBehavioralGuidelines: Add behavioral guidelines specific to this mode
promptsView.openFile: Open or create an empty file

slug.title: Slug
slug.description: The slug is used in URLs and file names. It should be lowercase and contain only letters, numbers, and hyphens.

roleDefinition.title: Role Definition
roleDefinition.description: Define Roo's expertise and personality for this mode.

specific.title: Project-specific (.roomodes)
specific.description: Only available in this workspace, takes precedence over global

tools.title: Available Tools
tools.description: Select which tools this mode can use.

customInstructions.title: Custom Instructions
customInstructions.description: Add behavioral guidelines specific to this mode.

ENHANCE.label: Enhance Prompt
ENHANCE.description: Use prompt enhancement to get tailored suggestions or improvements for your inputs. This ensures Roo understands your intent and provides the best possible responses. Available via the âœ¨ icon in chat.

EXPLAIN.label: Explain Code
EXPLAIN.description: Get detailed explanations of code snippets, functions, or entire files. Useful for understanding complex code or learning new patterns. Available in code actions (lightbulb icon in the editor) and the editor context menu (right-click on selected code).

FIX.label: Fix Issues
FIX.description: Get help identifying and resolving bugs, errors, or code quality issues. Provides step-by-step guidance for fixing problems. Available in code actions (lightbulb icon in the editor) and the editor context menu (right-click on selected code).

IMPROVE.label: Improve Code
IMPROVE.description: Receive suggestions for code optimization, better practices, and architectural improvements while maintaining functionality. Available in code actions (lightbulb icon in the editor) and the editor context menu (right-click on selected code).

ADD_TO_CONTEXT.label: Add to Context
ADD_TO_CONTEXT.description: Add context to your current task or conversation. Useful for providing additional information or clarifications. Available in code actions (lightbulb icon in the editor). and the editor context menu (right-click on selected code).

TERMINAL_ADD_TO_CONTEXT.label: Add Terminal Content to Context
TERMINAL_ADD_TO_CONTEXT.description: Add terminal output to your current task or conversation. Useful for providing command outputs or logs. Available in the terminal context menu (right-click on selected terminal content).

TERMINAL_FIX.label: Fix Terminal Command
TERMINAL_FIX.description: Get help fixing terminal commands that failed or need improvement. Available in the terminal context menu (right-click on selected terminal content).

TERMINAL_EXPLAIN.label: Explain Terminal Command
TERMINAL_EXPLAIN.description: Get detailed explanations of terminal commands and their outputs. Available in the terminal context menu (right-click on selected terminal content).

enableServerCreation.title: Enable MCP Server Creation
enableServerCreation.description: When enabled, Roo can help you create new MCP servers via commands like "add a new tool to...". If you don't need to create MCP servers you can disable this to reduce Roo's token usage.

networkTimeout.title: Network Timeout
networkTimeout.description: Maximum time to wait for server responses

enableToggle.title: Enable MCP Servers
enableToggle.description: When enabled, Roo will be able to interact with MCP servers for advanced functionality. If you're not using MCP, you can disable this to reduce Roo's token usage.
